hero_subtitle: Your trusted partner in managing your farm.
section_text: We provide integrated agricultural solutions with professional management to ensure maximum productivity and long-term sustainability for your farm.
about_intro: Rayan Agricultural Services and Consulting was established to provide fully integrated agricultural solutions that combine expertise, precision, and smart farm management.

about_items.title: Who We Are
about_items.text: We work on developing palm farms and various agricultural projects with the highest quality standards to achieve maximum productivity and long-term sustainability.

about_items.title: Agricultural Management Plan
text: Accurate periodic monitoring of all farming and production stages.
Improving irrigation and fertilization efficiency based on soil and crop needs.
Applying modern management methods to ensure premium crop quality.

about_items.title: Specialized Services
text: Full farm management including supervision and operations.
Designing scientifically based irrigation and fertilization programs.
Providing carefully selected seedlings and palm trees.
Integrated pest management using advanced protection systems.
Preparing and renovating farms with top-quality standards.

about_items.title: Fast Service
about_items.text: We are committed to delivering tasks quickly while maintaining high accuracy and consistent follow-up.

about_items.title: Expert Team
about_items.text: Rayan includes a group of agricultural engineers and consultants with extensive experience in palm farm management.

services_intro: We provide a wide range of high-quality agricultural services.

services_list.title: Farm Consultation Service
points: Accurate technical consultations to improve productivity
Regular follow-ups and recommendations based on farm condition

services_list.title: Full Farm Management Service
points: Daily and precise follow-up on all farm activities
Weekly visits to review performance and ensure quality
Customized irrigation, fertilization, and pest-control programs

services_list.title: Fertilizers & Pesticides Supply Service
points: Supplying trusted and guaranteed agricultural products
Assistance in choosing the best options for your farm
Delivery right to your farm’s gate

services_list.title: Palm Seedlings & Tissue Culture Supply
points: Providing certified, high-quality seedlings and tissue culture palms
Selecting suitable varieties based on production goals

services_list.title: Farm Visit & Inspection Service
points: Professional on-site inspection and full evaluation
A detailed report with required actions and recommendations

services_list.title: Daily Tasks & Technical Operations Service
points: Executing all agricultural operations with professionalism
Continuous follow-up to ensure the best results for palm farms
